POST / HTTP/1.1

<公共请求参数>

        "InstanceId": "cdwch-1vud9x9x",
        "UserName": "admin",
        "PassWord": "base54加密",
        "Describe": "测试用户"

}

CreateBackUpSchedule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com

<公共请求参数>

{
    "BackUpTables": [
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "customer",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 1203976330,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        },
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "lineorder",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 179936234797,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        }
    ],
    "WeekDays": "2",
    "ExecuteHour": 1,
    "ScheduleId": 4879
}
